name: Gnomad 2
summary: A tool for managing Creative Nomad/Zen Jukeboxes and Dell DJs
description: Gnomad 2 is a GUI built on top of GTK/GNOME 2, id3lib and libnjb that makes it possible to transfer tracks and files from/to a Creative Nomad Jukebox (all brands). It is designed much like an ordinary graphical FTP program.
